channel.title: [PI] Domination-Scape, Need Devolopers!
channel.description:
Sorry if this is in the Wrong section, i didnt know were else to post...
Hey Moparscape I started a server a few weeks ago Knowing nothing about java, I still dont know much but i get by :P I downloaded my source from Ifailatcoding, but everyone claimed that his source had viruses and whatever but i never go any so whatever :D
any ways my server features are
* Working Skill Cape emotes *Torva *Primal *D claws (Special works) *All godsword (with spec) * Home is Edgeville (I know alot of servers use this home but i really like it :P) *NPC vendors all around the home * Has a custom minigame at home as well *custom quest tab interface, Shows amount of player, PC points, PK points and the slayer task. *and yes of course we have a pk point system * The server also load 525 Graphics... It has moving whip!! LOL
(sorry for the fail list of features i dont really know how to post properly, this is my first ALMOST good post lol)
Pictures? Ok...
2 Examples of Skill cape (I dont want to over crowed this with Pictures...
[img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/5192/skillcapeemotes.png[/img]
Primal and Torva Gear
[img]http://img199.imageshack.us/img199/4445/gearor.png[/img]
Specials on Weapons!!
[img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/3537/specialsh.png[/img]
Sorry if the pictures look dodgy i did them the best i could!! :)
If you would like to help out with my server please contact me at
msn: matt_home_66@hotmail.com Or add my skype: Gunnarr5
Thank you and I hope to be in touch with you soon!!
P.S we are on a host, We just haven't got it running yet... we have hit a problem in the setup..

item.title: [PI] Domination-Scape, Need Devolopers!

item.description:
@oldskoolpk wrote:

dude, they flame because of people like you.
doesn’t even know what he’s doing and wants other people to feed him.
and the funny thing is, these “flamers” are the ones that actually succeed, not failures like you.

item.title: [PI] Domination-Scape, Need Devolopers!
item.dc:creator: @gunnarx gunnarx
item.description:
@gunnarx wrote:

Ix Soulcist xI:

You’ve got to clean up this thread and don’t use the colors at least not a lot. This is going to need some serious organization skills. You might want to create an application so this will qualify for ‘Development Teams’. And I don’t like the server to be honest.

I Dont GOT to do anything this thread has been open for around 2-3 days now… So i dont really care if it gets removed, and i really dont care what u think about the server keep ur opinion to yaself, no one else cares really, all this forum has on it is flamers and fuck heads abit like yaself mate (Y) so fuck off and leave me alone

Read full topic

Sorry if this is in the Wrong section, i didnt know were else to post…

Hey Moparscape I started a server a few weeks ago Knowing nothing about java, I still dont know much but i get by
